channel.title: Field Recorders and Test Equipment on FishLasers
channel.description: Recent content in Field Recorders and Test Equipment on FishLasers

item.title: Behringer CT200
item.description: Cable tester and tone generator. XLR, Phono, 3.5mm, 6.25mm, RJ45, MIDI, USB.

item.title: Earplug2
item.description: XLR tap listener, phantom tester and injector, signal generator and headphone amp.

item.title: Zoom H2n
item.description: 2/4-channel handy recorder. X/Y, Mid-Side, 2-channel surround and 4-channel surround.

item.title: Zoom H6
item.description: 6-channel battery-powered recorder. Records to SD cards (not included). X/Y and M/S capsules. Supplied with case and accessories including optional fluffy windshield and remote control.
